original: Last minute travel is the best kind of travel, especially if you've accidentally killed your girlfriend or received word of a federal indictment.
translated: 旅游的最好方式就是说走就走，特别是在过失杀人和收到诉状后赶着跑路。

original: We've bought up the entire excess inventory from airlines and hotels and have put together some truly amazing vacations to places you've never thought of going.
translated: 我们把航空公司的余票和酒店的空房都买了下来，拼凑出了你意想不到的各种行程。

original: Why pay the airline and hotel directly when a dubious online intermediary can slash your costs by hiding all the extra charges until your credit card details have already been processed?  Our database is packed with too-good-to-be-true deals designed to seduce and deceive the customer with false advertising.
translated: 既然能在可疑的在线平台买到低价旅游套餐，何必直接找航司和酒店买票订房？收到信用卡账单的时候，你才会发现我们的低价其实少算了很多杂七杂八的费用。我们的数据库中满是划算到有点假的套餐，配上夸张的宣传，专坑贪便宜的顾客。

original: Like any successful business, the travel industry is all about connections... and our flights have LOTS of them.  We fill up empty seats with empty promises.
translated: 和很多成功的事业一样，旅游业想发财也需要各种转机... 而我们有的是需要转机的行程。我们空口说白话，填满了航班上的空位。

original: All special offers are subject to impossible-to-meet conditions, all purchases are non-refundable and we reserve the right to cancel any part of the itinerary at the last minute.
translated: 所有低价均以几乎无法满足的条件计算。一旦付款概不退款。我们保留出发前取消行程中任何安排的权利。

original: You have been selected to join our exclusive Travel Club!  Enjoy special discounts, amazing offers and unique package deals all for the low promotional rate of $2,000 per year!  A telemarketer will call you every 10 minutes for the rest of your life!
translated: 恭喜你，你已被选为我们高级旅行俱乐部的会员！即刻享受特惠折扣、惊爆特价和神奇大礼包吧！会员年费折后只需2000元！接下来的半辈子，你每十分钟都会接到一个促销电话！
